metadata.title: CVE-2024-22231 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Syndic cache directory creation is vulnerable to a directory traversalattack in salt project which can leadÂ a malicious attacker to create anarbitrary directory on a Salt master.

criterions.comment: salt package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
